title: sharadha paahimam
sahitya:
shAradE pAhimAm sarOruha nibhapradE sArasAkSa shrI vAsudEva

karuNAnvitE varadE



anupallavi



nIrajAsana jAyE nikhila vidyApradE nAradAdi sakala muni vinutE

suradE



caraNam



cAru vINAdi su-shObhitakarE hIramaNi hArE lasita kandara

 vArNEndra nAtha sura nikarE vArijAkSaNE rucira bimbadharE
